Other Information.Additional Info: Evaluated using mixtures of HRP tryptic digests and OVA protein at different molar ratios.
Glycopeptides from HRP were successfully enriched.

Sieving Mechanism: Size-exclusion effect due to ordered mesoporous channels with a pore size of 3.2 nm.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Enriched 19 glycopeptide peaks from HRP tryptic digests with enhanced signal-to-noise ratio; identified 162 glycopeptides from healthy serum and 156 glycopeptides from breast cancer serum.

Other Information.Additional Info: The material exhibits excellent hydrophilicity, magnetic responsiveness, and reusability. It was effective in separating glycopeptides from large proteins like ovalbumin.
